data.message: I love facebook, but I have some peeves I wish you would fix, I don't like it when I click to read comments and it takes me to another page and I lose my place when I return back to the feeds. I also don't care seeing other people likes or comments for people I dont know.

replies.message: Hi Linda. We’re sorry to hear that you didn’t enjoy your Facebook experience. If there is anything that you would change about it please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Chantal
Can you please sort my FB friends alphabetically? Now you do how often you communicate to them or the other way around! I have about 180 friends...very frustrating!

I've fount that using the "back arrow" on Facebook takes me back to the page I was on. That solved the problem I "thought" I had when it didn't go back were I was. Sometimes I forget and just click back on home which, as it says, takes me back to my home page.
some times that works for me, sometimes it dont
I've had the same frustrating experience, and it wastes time. Another way to avoid it is to open another tab with your facebook page on it. The first will remain as you left it.
Right click and open in another window. Then, your previous page will be there when you close that window.
Middle click on the mouse' roller and it opens in a new Tab.
Linda Steelman,,   It don't ??   ( it DOESNT  )
Thanks guys, I know how to do all that. it would just be more convenience to not have too.
ps I hate grammar police., bless your heart
Would be awesome if there was a way hide comments that are just other people tagging their friends.
